subject: Automobile Racing
Talladega Superspeedway
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Montoya won the first pole of his Nascar career, taking the top starting spot for the Aaron’s 499 at Talladega Superspeedway to put himself in position for his first win on an oval. Since leaving Formula One in late 2006, Montoya has won only once, on a road course.
